00017 class CMGraphicDraw extends CMGraphic {
00018  
00022  public $resource = false;
00023  
00027  private $strokeColor = false;
00028  
00032  private $strokeWidth = 1;
00033  
00039  private $font;

00046  private $antialias = false;

00059  public function CMGraphicDraw($file = false) {
00060   parent::CMGraphic($file);
00061   
00062   // if we were given a file location then we need to create the resource from that
00063   if($this->getImageType() == "GIF")
00064    $this->resource = imagecreatefromgif($file);
00065   else if($this->getImageType() == "JPEG")
00066    $this->resource = imagecreatefromjpeg($file);
00067   else if($this->getImageType() == "PNG")
00068    $this->resource = imagecreatefrompng($file);
00069    
00070   // set the defaults
00071   $this->strokeColor = CMColor::$Black;
00072   $this->font = CMFont::$BuiltIn3;
00073  }
00074  
00084  public function setStrokeColor(CMColor $color) {
00085   $this->strokeColor = $color;
00086   return $this->strokeColor;
00087  }
00088  
00095  public function getStrokeColor() {
00096   return $this->strokeColor;
00097  }
00098  
00113  public function drawArc($cx, $cy, $width, $height, $start, $end, $a = array()) {
00114   if($this->resource === false)
00115    return false;
00116   
00117   $color = $this->strokeColor->getGDColor($this->resource);
00118   return imagearc($this->resource, $cx, $cy, $width, $height, $start, $end, $color);
00119  }
00120

00132    return false;

00134   $color = $this->strokeColor->getGDColor($this->resource);
00135   return imagerectangle($this->resource, $x1, $y1, $x2, $y2, $color);

00215  public function colorAtPixel($x, $y) {
00216   if($this->resource === false)
00217    return false;
00218   
00219   $rgb = imagecolorat($this->resource, $x, $y);
00220   $r = ($rgb >> 16) & 0xFF;
00221   $g = ($rgb >> 8) & 0xFF;
00222   $b = $rgb & 0xFF;
00223   
00224   return new CMColor($r, $g, $b, 0);
00225  }
00226  
00236  public function drawLine($x1, $y1, $x2, $y2) {

00238    return false;
00239   
00240   $color = $this->strokeColor->getGDColor($this->resource);
00241   return imageline($this->resource, $x1, $y1, $x2, $y2, $color);
00242  }

00260  public function drawPolygon($points) {
00261   if($this->resource === false)
00262    return false;

00264   $color = $this->strokeColor->getGDColor($this->resource);
00265   return imagepolygon($this->resource, $points, count($points) / 2, $color);

00306  public function getHeight() {
00307   if($this->resource !== false)
00308    return imagesy($this->resource);
00309    
00310   return parent::getHeight();
00311  }
00312  
00317  public function getWidth() {
00318   if($this->resource !== false)
00319    return imagesx($this->resource);

00321   return parent::getWidth();

00334    return false;

00349  public function setStrokeWidth($width) {
00350   $this->strokeWidth = $width;
00351   if(imagesetthickness($this->resource, $this->strokeWidth))
00352    return $this->strokeWidth;
00353   return false;
00354  }

00486  public function drawString($x, $y, $string) {
00487   if($this->resource === false)
00488    return false;
00489   
00490   $color = $this->strokeColor->getGDColor($this->resource);
00491   $font = $this->font->getFontID();
00492   return imagestring($this->resource, $font, $x, $y, $string, $color);
00493  }

00505  public function drawVerticalString($x, $y, $string) {
00506   if($this->resource === false)
00507    return false;
00508   
00509   $color = $this->strokeColor->getGDColor($this->resource);
00510   $font = $this->font->getFontID();
00511   return imagestringup($this->resource, $font, $x, $y, $string, $color);
